games.name: Rock-Paper-Scissors
games.description: Play the classic game of Rock-Paper-Scissors against our computer. Pick one of the options and test your luck!

games.name: Higher-Lower
games.description: Play the Higher or Lower guest game against our computer. Pick if the next card will be higher or lower than the current one and test your luck!

games.name: Pig-Game
games.description: Play the classic dice game: Pig. Roll the dice and add the result to your score. If you roll one it is game over!

games.name: Dice-Poker
games.description: Play a simple version of poker against our computer. There are not bets, just roll 5 dices and test your luck!

games.name: Hangman
games.description: Play the classic guest game Hangman. Try to guest the country, but be careful, six wrong guesses and is GAME OVER!

games.name: Simon-Game
games.description: Play the famous 80's game: Simon Game. Watch the sequence and then click the buttons in the right order. See if you can reach level. 15 and win the game!

games.name: Memory
games.description: Play a round of memory. Pick one of the 12 cards and try to find the match. See how quick can you find all the pairs!
